w_pistol.name: Rzakczja-2
w_pistol.desc:
Pronounced "Zhak-chya 2."
A Polish-made standard-use pistol. A bit weak, yet extremely reliable; also good at long range.

w_rifle.name: Wolffang-1
w_rifle.desc:
Outdatedâ€¦
An American automatic rifle effective at medium range. Outdated by a few models, this one has pretty bad accuracy.

w_blade.name: Alien Blade
w_blade.desc:
Looks like a wrench.
An alien blade designed to be easy to throw. Extremely effective at close range.

w_shotgun.name: Awa-awa
w_shotgun.desc:
Glorified bubble wand.
An Experimental weapon that launches slightly acidic bubbles in multiple directions. Effective in tight spaces.

u_pistol.name: Upgrade Module: Rzakczja
u_pistol.desc: Take this to an upgrade station to increase the power of the Rzakczja-2 Pistol.

u_rifle.name: Upgrade Module: Wolffang
u_rifle.desc: Take this to an upgrade station to increase the power of the Wolffang-1 Rifle.

u_blade.name: Upgrade Module: Blade
u_blade.desc: Take this to an upgrade station to increase the power of the Alien Blade.

u_shotgun.name: Upgrade Module: Awa-awa
u_shotgun.desc: Take this to an upgrade station to increase the power of the Awa-awa Shotgun.

bandage.name: Bandage
bandage.desc:
Restores around 10% of max HP
A patch that helps protect wounds, letting them heal.

health_patch.name: Health Patch
health_patch.desc:
Restores around 33% of max HP
A medical patch that speeds up the immune system. Falls off when finished.

life_orb.name: Health Patch
life_orb.desc:
Fully restores all HP
A strange orb that fully heals the body. Afterward it becomes useless.

used_patch.name: Used Patch
used_patch.desc: A used health patch, completely useless.

used_orb.name: Used Orb
used_orb.desc: A used life orb, completely useless.

jetpack_1.name: Icarus Mk I
jetpack_1.desc:
Press [JUMP] again to Double Jump!
A jetpack-like device that releases an intense burst of air to launch you up.

jetpack_2.name: Icarus Mk II
jetpack_2.desc:
Press & hold [JUMP] to fly!
A jetpack-like device that releases an constant stream of air to let you fly! Launches a final burst when it runs out.
